name: pygridgen
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: pygridgen
    version: 0.1.1

source:
    git_url: https://github.com/phobson/pygridgen.git
    git_tag: 0.1.1

build:
    number: 0
    skip: True  # [win]
    script: python setup.py install

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - numpy
    run:
        - python
        - pandas
        - numpy
        - matplotlib
        - pyproj
        - gridgen

test:
    imports:
        - pygridgen

about:
    home: https://github.com/hetland/pygridgen
    # See: https://github.com/hetland/pygridgen/issues/27 for the license choice.
    license:  MIT
    summary: Python interface to gridgen by Pavel Sakov

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
        - phobson

about.summary: Python interface to gridgen by Pavel Sakov
